{# render #} {% var count = 0 %}{% for i := 0; i < 100; i++ %}{% count++ %}{% end for %} count is {{ count }} {% if count > 50 %}count is > 50{% else %}count is <= 50{% end if %} {% var i = interface{}(432) %} {% switch i.(type) %}{% case string %} is a string {% case int %} is an int {% end switch %} {% i2 := interface{}(-42) %} {% res := i.(int) - i2.(int) %} res is {{ res }} {% for i in []int{1,2,3} %}{{ i }}{% end %} {% for k in map[int]string{1:"a"} %}{{ k }}{% end %} {{ 5 }} {% show 5 %} {% show(5) %} {{ ( i2 ) }} {% show ( i2 ) %} {{ "scriggo" }} {% show "scriggo" %} {% show("scriggo") %}
